# Update Sign-In Token

**Web Service Endpoint**

Updates a specific sign-in token to a new value.

## Overview

Use this endpoint to update a specific [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccountManager/AutoSignInToken-swift.struct] to a new [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSAutoSignInToken/value].

## Token updates

- **UpdateAutoSignInTokenRequest**: The request body that contains the old sign-in token and the new sign-in token.

items.description: The request body that contains the old sign-in token and the new sign-in token.
items.name: UpdateAutoSignInTokenRequest

title: Update Sign-In Token
